sentences.english: She carries herself very nicely and attracts all the men.

sentences.english: Regular movement is also important for preserving good posture.

sentences.english: She had a plump shape and I could develop a sense of touching on to her.

sentences.english: This posture stabilizes the upper chest and shoulders, making it easier to use the accessory breathing muscles
sentences.chinese: 這種體態使上胸和肩穩定，從而更容易使用副呼吸肌。

sentences.english: The risk was increased for increases in size by somatotype or by weight gain since age 18 years.
sentences.chinese: 從18歲開始，體態或體重增加風險也會繼續上升。

sentences.english: Here are 5 reasons to have good posture.
sentences.chinese: 以下是關於保持好的體態的5大理由。

sentences.english: On her right side is a twisting dragon rising to the sky.
